long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color plucker helps to pick any color which is visible on your screen and then you get to know the color hex code of that color.It can help you while doing development and you find a color appealing but you do not know the exact hex code of that color so you can use this color and used it in your code.
